title: After owning every Singed skin for several years...
body: PLEASE RIOT BRING BACK THE RIOT SINGED SKIN PLEASE JUST FOR LIKE 20 MINUTES, I DON'T CARE IF IT'S 5000 RP I REALLY DON'T PLEASE GOD LET ME HAVE IT

replies.body:
Hey Treasure Goblin, 

Unfortunately, we don't have plans to bring this particular skins back in the foreseeable future.
*Plays the saddest song on the world's tiniest violin*

what about like, have a "riot day" celebrating riot's founding? you could have every riot skin available for a day or something 


T.T

don't worry i'll write a letter to riot HQ

Just like last time Riot did this, with Silent Night Sona, Re-Gifted Amumu & friends. Remember that, how everyone was completely fine with it and didn't cause a fuss at all?
lol? i have about 45 legacy and a few limited skins, i *literally* couldn't give less than a shit if they came back

You aren't the whole community, yo.

Riot did something like this once, like i allude to in my above post. In the end they had to refund all the people who owned the skins originally that they said they wouldn't put back on sale, and touch up the splash arts if you owned it before it went back on sale.

I'm sure they aren't keen to do that again.
There is a reason that is like one of the top 3 rarest skins in the game, behind champ riven and ufo corki
